item.title: jq: Ad hoc JSON processing made easy
item.description: Nowadays, a developer needs to deal with JSON quite frequently. RESTful web services are everywhere. Whether you need to work with Elasticsearch, DynamoDB, Neo4j, Titan, or an internal Restful API for a web application you will probably end up dealing with JSON.

item.title: Coding as a game.. What?
item.description: I was looking for a site that would help me hone my coding skills in a competitive environment. I have tried sites like LeetCode, or Topcoder before, but I needed something more fun. It looks like I found what I was looking for at CodinGame. I wouldn’t call it perfect, but I like the way it provides a competitive programming environment while writing game code. There are many sections in CodinGame.

item.title: Note taking for developers
item.description: Developers take notes for many reasons. Whether it is to remember the steps to execute an operational process, or to keep a summary of a training or even to take meeting notes, note taking is a crucial part of our lives.
